title: New: Southern Shore – Night is Young
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/southernshores.jpg "southernshores") **Southern Shore**](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Southern-Shores/148367388549736)’s new single, ‘_Night is Young_’, is a breath of fresh air. Re-working the hook of **Cathy Dennis**’ ‘T_ouch Me (All Night Long)_’, the track oozes with a summer atmosphere. Carefree and soulful, it glistens with a longing for the sun and boasts a romance that only our current season can muster. Stream the track below, and head on over to [**Cascine**](http://www.cascine.us/) on July 12 to buy the _Atlantic EP._

 [Southern Shores – 04 Night Is Young](http://soundcloud.com/cascine/04-night-is-young) by [CASCINE](http://soundcloud.com/cascine)
